name: Happiness Squad
description:
once upon a time, on the planet Earth, while people are living in peace, a strange call comes from outside the galaxy to the space station, warning them of an infection that causes depression and makes the planet and the people without colors black and white .

 As someone listens to the message, an infected meteor falls and the space agency sends A group of astronauts called (Happiness Squad ) to collect colors and bring back happiness to the earth....

Music & Sound From  :  soundjay.com

Boss Art From  :  craftpix.net
